name: Pocket Brew - Micro Climate
description:
Our single-serve coffee packs combine the speed of an instant brew with the unrivalled quality of ARAKU's specialty coffee. As the name suggests, these drip bag sachets fit any pocket or purse and offer an extremely portable coffee. Each sachet is packaged individually and nitrogen-flushed to maintain the coffee's integrity and freshness. Suited for the airplane, the open road, hotels, offices, or even when you just need a quick fix at home. A sturdy cup and hot water does the trick.  

This pack contains 10 individual sachets.
